The 1st work for violin, instrumental ensemble and computer-processed sound; the 2nd for voice and computer; the 3rd for piano.
Text of the 2nd work from: The unbearable lightness of being / Milan Kundera.
In the 1st work: Jǹos Nǧyšy, violin ; SONOR ensemble ; Rand Steiger, conductor. In the 2nd: Philip Larson, baritone. In the 3rd: Aleck Karis, piano.
Recorded at Studio A, Dept. of Music, University of California at San Diego.
